Address.label: Address
Address.value: 195 CHURCH STREET,14TH FLOOR 16TH FLOOR, NEW HAVEN, Connecticut, 06510, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Trevi Therapeutics Inc is a clinical-stage biopharmaceutical company focused on the development and commercialization of nalbuphine ER to treat serious neurologically mediated conditions. It is involved in developing nalbuphine ER for the treatment of chronic pruritus, chronic cough in patients with idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis, or IPF, and levodopa-induced dyskinesia, or LID, in patients with Parkinson's disease.
